summary: This is an internal FBI email chain regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's bail hearing on July 14, 2020. It indicates Maxwell was denied bail and that an SCN (Special Correspondence Notification) was requested by EM (likely Epstein or Epstein-related personnel) following the hearing.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the email; appears to have been denied bail at a hearing on July 14, 2020.

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: Addressed in the email by the sender from the Crimes Against Children and Human Trafficking Unit, who asks to be informed of the hearing outcome.

connections.description: EM is interested in receiving notification about Maxwell's bail hearing outcome, indicating a connection.

events.title: Maxwell Bail Hearing
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's bail hearing where she was denied bail.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was denied bail at a hearing on July 14, 2020.
An internal FBI email discusses the hearing outcome and a request for an SCN (Special Correspondence Notification).
A person or entity referred to as 'EM' wanted to be notified after the hearing, suggesting ongoing interest in Maxwell's legal status.
